meals.description: The famous Greek salad of crispy lettuce, olives and our Chicago style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.
Our bruschetta is made from grilled bread that has been smeared with fresh garlic and seasoned with salt and premium olive oil from Greece.
Our delicious lemon tart comes straight from Nanaâ€™s recipe book, made with lemons from sunny Sicily and our special secret ingredient!
